title: Cait's Traps and Turret
body:
Is it just me or are Caits traps under turret an issue? She can place as many as she wants as long as she has them to place (like if she has 5, she can place as many of those as she likes up to the max of 5), and they are untargetable. There's no penalty.

Like invisible traps can be destroyed safely and are revealed under turret. Nids traps deal a little damage but it is up to her if she jumps in and if she does there's room for counter play. Azir's soldiers aren't traps but if I remember right their duration is decreased under turret but cost the same amount of mana to use.

So why is Cait allowed to completely fill up your turret if she chooses without any penalty? Te only way to get rid of them is walk over them and then she can safely point and click shoot you from a distance. I get that she's supposed to be oppressive but right now she's pretty strong and being able to zone you out of turret without any penalty seems a bit too oppressive. Nobody else can do it so why can she?

Like what if she was only allowed to place a few traps under turret? She can place as many as she wants anywhere else but under turret the amount she can put down is reduced. 

Jg ganks under turrets with lots of traps are also so much easier, seeing as you'll most likely get snared if you run. 


Idk, this feels kinda not right to me. Am I the only one?

replies.body:
Shes a sieger. Someone who obviously beat you to the objective. If you were at baron/dragon first then she cant set up traps. If she does then that means your team is constantly backing off which shows weakness.

There are a lot of champions that are way more oppressive

Lets talk about {{champion:1}} {{champion:53}} {{champion:41}} {{champion:54}} {{champion:13}} 


''Get near your turret, i fucking dare you''

Uh yeah, except most of those aren't as oppressive directly under your tower unless you have no minions there. Annie's probably not going to ult-combo you under your own tower, Blitz can't do shit if minions are in the way, you can easily pop GP barrels before he does, Malph does nothing except point and click slow hit thing under your tower, and Ryze can't do anything if minions are in the way.

Cait just sets up traps that are immune to destruction entirely and last an indefinite amount of time under your own fucking tower. And then if you step on it, you get caught and hit by a headshot that does massive damage.

Agreed. She also has long range, Q that goes through minions, targeted ult, outranges you and can't get abilities blocked by minions, and got a poke passive that does a lot of poke for you, besides the fact that she can prevent ganks by seeing and snarring your jungler.

> [{quoted}](name=nep2une,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EEmEBjXa,comment-id=00000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-07-09T18:33:12.603+0000)

The best way i can put it is a bum on the street cant tell a business man what financially works and what doesnt. 

No thats not a diss. Thats an honest comparison. If someone doesnt have any credibility to back them up, then nobody will believe what they say. I'm not even trying to be mean im just being 100% honest. 

A bronze player telling anyone ''whats broken and whats not'' well nobody will believe them.

I agree with you there is a lack of counterplay when it comes to caitlyns traps, because i main caitlyn and theres usually nothing you can do except step in the traps and get headshotted.

But i also realize there are adcs like sivir who make sieging 100% impossible, Ashe who has the most utility out of any ADC, Jhin who kills you when hes not even on the map and Jinx melting a tank in about 1 second flat with 110% Splash damage and longer range than caitlyn by 50 before mid game.

As for Azir, When you hit maybe Plat 3? Azir is usually a #1 pick. As someone whos been on some gold to plat amateur teams, Azir is a #1 pick. As someone who watches the LCS Daily, Azir is a #1 pick/ban. 

Azir is not fair, You can disagree. But i share the same opinion when i say azir isnt fair, because people whom are in Diamond to Challenger have also said this many many times. And id rather believe THEM than you, Especially because i see it for myself that azir is bullshit.

You wanna know who ELSE thinks azir is bullshit? Riot.

Riot said in their last post about balance that They're looking to nerf azir because hes overly oppressive in lane as to where hes supposed to be a hypercarry. Hint hypercarries are supposed to be weak early game, Azir isnt.

Not trying to really argue, just trying to say that i didnt think azir was broken either, until i actually watched him and fought him.

Except my rank being Bronze has literally no relevance when I'm quoting data from Plat+ games/using various data sites (League of Graphs, etc) across various ranks for actual hard proof? Or you know, according to you, I guess my vision just magically alters the numbers on the screen because I'm Bronze.

Also I never said Cait is OP. I just said her traps being able to be placed under towers is unreasonable, considering there's no counterplay to them really except stepping on them and getting headshot. I also never said no other ADCs are OP/too strong/too good at sieging/etc right now.

Azir is a popular pick in LCS. He is also very flashy and looks cool and does damage if you can do things. That is why people pick him, because they all think they can be that Faker/whatever other LCS pro. Except they really can't.

Also, I never said Azir is fair or not oppressive. He is very oppressive and unfun to lane against. He has extremely long ranged untargetable soldiers who can deal massive damage, mobility, an undashable ult wall that knocks back everyone it hits, instantaneous autos that make it easy to CS, so on and so forth. Laning against him is hell. However, even with all of his multiple upsides, which means he should be performing extremely well, every single piece of data says he's not doing well at all. That is the point I am trying to make.

Azir needs a rework as a whole, to adjust the overly oppressive/hellish laning experience he creates in early, while still being able to actually succeed and function in late game as he should as an AP Attack Speed Carry.

Do you get what I am saying?

Also regarding your ''no relevance when im quoting data from plat+ games using various data sites''

No i said using win rates doesnt mean jack shit. Ryze has a 42% win rate right now but he is thought of as one of the most broken / unbalanced champs in this game. Have you laned against a ryze? Have you fought a ryze?

My point is dont use win rates unless they're above 53% because they really dont mean shit.

No, I didn't say Azir was OP here. Azir is not OP.
He is oppressive, unfair, and unfun to play against in laning phase.
This is different from being OP.
He is still a terrible mid pick.

Yeah except Ryze has a low skillfloor/high skillceiling, and is trash unless someone has extensive experience on him?

But okay, data apparently doesn't matter I guess.
Have fun staying ignorant. ;^)

They last 90 seconds but that's still pretty long and kinda unreasonable if they are under your tower. 

And the fact that there is no counterplay except avoid them, step on them and get shot, or be {{champion:25}} and spellshield them is an issue if she is going to dump them into your tower. 

That's why I was thinking the timer for them should be reduced so they cant sit in your tower for that long.

Cait traps are stupid. I was playing zac the other day and I started channeling my elastic slingshot. Cait must've spotted me with a ward, but instead of turning tail, she just threw a trap down between me and her as soon as I released the ability. It triggered WHILE I WAS IN MID FLIGHT and completely fucked me. Headshot, net, headshot, peacemaker and then the support came in and completely fucked me. That's not ok

thematically it makes 0 sense. same  as jax triggering teemo shrooms if he jumps over them.
you mean counter play like channeling  the sling shot for upwards of 2.5 seconds and flying leisurely through the air

Well u see, usually Turrets should be something like a safe place. 
Currently turrets are more a decoration in the rift and being behind and getting sieged is difficult but you can make a comeback if they decide to dive you and fail. 
But with a Cait you get thrown back even more because you can't do shit against her traps (take into account that your team is already behind) so you basically have two choices: give up the turret or fight and lose the game. 
So you basically have to give up every tower just because the enemy picked caitlyn. 
Same applies to the opposite situation when caitlyns team is behind, just because she can spam her traps all over the place it's nearly impossible to get to a tower (when caitlyn is alive) without getting chunked down. 
It's just too much zoning power in such a low cost/spammable ability. 
Same reason why Azirs soldiers decay twice as fast under tower, because it is not even remotely funny to get poked down by azir outside of tower range.

This too. I understand she's supposed to be a seige adc but she's a little bit strong..

Honestly ... good. If you're all clumped under your tower and aren't fighting for vision on your flanks, you deserve to lose. If you're clumped under your tower *without a tank* who can eat those traps, this applies even more. You're trying to 5v5 without a frontline. What the actual heck?

????
You do realize that if a tank in a team which is behind would walk over a trap he would be dead instantly?

I doubt that. They have tenacity and sustain. If it's a support tank, they'll have damage reduction or a shield. If it's lane tank, they have engage and the enemy team will get punished for tunneling.

You punish the enemy team when you are rooted, chain CCed and sit under their tower....
Which tank has sustain? Malph? Sion? Amumu? Nautilus?

Sure you do, the first tower shots do negligible damage, the chain CC is less potent and punishable because of tenacity and sustain is provided via items and grasp, not to mention a well-timed shield is effectively the same thing.

>{{champion:41}} {{champion:54}} {{champion:13}} 

What?

???
Except Cait siege in bot lane is the main issue, why can she zone all by herself without a team?

If shes sieging a tower with her support against someone.... Then why is your mid laner and jungler not coming to get a sweet ass double kill...

And then the mid laner pings MIA and the cait backs off because the lane is warded and we can't go over there to sweep, and we still can't do anything about the traps except step on them. Great plan dude :D

> [{quoted}](name=AngusBoomPants,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EEmEBjXa,comment-id=0000000200000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-07-10T17:26:16.619+0000)

You have a jungler for a reason. Literally all you have to do is shove the mid lane wave in and go roam bot. If bot lane is backing out then go take the free drag..
And then cait does it again but there's no drag for 5 minutes

> [{quoted}](name=AngusBoomPants,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EEmEBjXa,comment-id=000000020000000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-07-10T17:54:26.459+0000)
>
> And then cait does it again but there's no drag for 5 minutes

Then if cait continues to push to your fucking tower, your jungler should be 9-0. If your jungler cant help bot lane because their jungler is there also, then go get rift herald and focus top. If rift herald is gone and caitlyn and her supp and jungler are bot, Go focus on mid lane.

Literally the games not that hard. Yeah its frustrating when theres ''5 traps under your tower'' but you crying and complaining instead of taking actual advice i dont know man..

All i know is if a caitlyn is shoving my bot lane under tower they better have that fuckin shit warded because i will camp them and i will get a double kill with my favorite jungler. {{champion:60}}
And then what? Late game comes and oops, your bot lane is super behind because the jungler can't come do anything. You lost the next 3 team fights and lost the game.
Sweeper should put a health bar on them and be able to be attacked
But that's what the traps are for, sieging

Yeah she's good at pushing you back to your tower.
She shouldn't be able to siege you under your own tower and prevent you from even walking up to/around your tower.

Seems perfectly fine to me. She's the zoning ADC. You can rotate around her traps. You can use the tank to eat one of the traps. In a 2v2 as when a shield/heals is up, either the ADC or supp can do that as well. What's more, she needs at least lv 9 to get 5 traps down. Before that, you can literally walk around them.
Don't forget that if her traps are under your turret, then they're NOT defensively placed at the same time that the lane is shoved forward. Your jungler should be having a field day with her ass.

Yeah zoning nice. 
But if you are interested just read my comment to the first post on this thread. 
During sieges or anti-sieges her potential is way too powerful.

It's part of Caitlyn's playstyle. She doesn't have much damage in her kit other than her passive, which her kit helps her proc. Continuing in that it is her playstyle, she is also a sieger. Her traps are excellent at sieging obviously, but if she isn't using her traps to siege turrets or objectives(baron and drag), that unless you are really good at cait, her traps are useless. 

TL:DR It's part of her gameplay and playstyle.

> [{quoted}](name=Womp123,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EEmEBjXa,comment-id=0016,timestamp=2016-07-10T02:39:27.304+0000)
